project.title: [Client Redacted] - Infrastructure Decommission & Migration

challenge.summary: Migrate 40+ production workloads from VMware to AWS while implementing DevOps practices, establishing robust infrastructure, and managing complex organizational transitions.

solution.summary: Strategic approach to infrastructure decommission and migration:
deliverables: Strategic planning and secure migration coordination
Data security measures and vendor coordination

outcomes: ✅ 40+ production workloads successfully migrated to AWS
✅ Standardized engineering workflows for global teams
✅ Successful organizational transitions with data integrity

items: Amazon AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, VPC, CloudFormation)
